paper_abstract: In our recent paper [MATCH Commun. Math. Comput. Chem. 71 (2013) 741-764] some formulas and figures were misprinted. In this paper, we correct these problems giving formal derivations of Zhang-Zhang (ZZ) polynomials for two classes of benzenoid systems, zigzag-edge coronoids and fenestrenes.
paper_title: Two Examples for the Application of the ZZDecomposer: Zigzag-Edge Coronoids and Fenestrenes
